content:
O2O commerce is a business model that strives to move potential customers from online platforms to physical stores. This approach aims to make the digital experience seamless at every stage: before, during and after the purchase. Retailers also run various advertising and email campaigns to attract online customers to make purchases from brick-and-mortar stores.

Online-to-offline (O2O) is one of the latest e-commerce business models that uniquely combines the benefits of both online and offline modes to help businesses achieve enhanced customer reach, larger market share and extended marketing capabilities, among other improvements. (this two paragraph please help me combine)]
